name: Manual Code Commit
description: Manually commit code changes with a descriptive message

action.prompt:
Please help me commit my code changes. Follow these steps:

1. Check what files have been modified using 'git status'
2. Provide a summary of the changes
3. Ask me for a commit message or suggest one based on the changes
4. Stage all changes using 'git add .'
5. Commit the changes using 'git commit -m "your message"'

Make sure to follow the project's commit message format: 'Task #X: Brief description of what was done'
